turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Upazilas of Bangladesh.
turn.1: What is the meaning of Thana in Bangladesh?
turn.2: The word "thana" is now used to solely refer to "police stations".
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Generally, there is one police station for each upazila; but larger administrative units may have more than one police station covering different regions.
turn.5: What is the meaning of UNO?
turn.6: Upazila Nirbahi Officer (UNO, or Upazila Executive Officer; ) is a non-elected Administrator in Upazila.
turn.7: What is the ranking of UNO?
turn.8: UNOs are Senior Assistant Secretary of Bangladesh Civil Service(Administration)Cadre.
turn.9: What is the UNO's role in the upazila?
turn.10: They act as executive officer of the upazila under the elected posts.
turn.12: Each Upazila Parishad (or council) has a "chairman", a "vice-chairman" and a "woman vice-chairman".
